creator: uffingtonhouse@yahoo.co.uk
text: When a Cookie contains a padded (with '=' characters) Base64 encoded value the Cookie returns the value minus the '=' characters.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44679 ***

creator: fhanik@apache.org
text: = is not a valid character in v0 cookies, both the HTTP and the servlet spec say so.
